list.name: Spotify
list.description: Spotify offers one of the largest music selection amongst its peers boosting a catalog of 30M+ songs. It also packs a feature-rich interface allowing subscribers to follow friends, see what they listen to, create, share and follow playlists and much more. It also offers expertly curated playlists as well as playlists tailored to activities like for example the user’s running speed.

pricing.misc: Ad-supported, 6 skips/hour, no downloads
Offline listening, Unlimitted skips
Premium subscription for up to 6 accounts
Save 50% on your Premium subscription

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: There are over 30 million songs in Spotify's catalog with over 20,000 new songs added each day. There's also a Video Series section (under Genres & Moods) offering a limited collection of Videos.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: The New Releases section includes new albums and singles and a weekly list (New Music Friday) of all the latest record releases, exclusive live sessions, and various new singles. There's also a Release Radar playlist with music from artists you care about.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: Create, share, and follow playlists of any kind — including those shared by friends, along with expertly curated playlists for any mood or genre. Your Music / Your Library, your personal Spotify collection, is limited to 10,000 songs.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: With Spotify Premium, you can download up to 3,333 songs per device, on a maximum of 3 different devices. You do need to go onto the internet at least once every 30 days to maintain your offline music settings.

features.name: Local Files / Uploads
features.description: Add music files stored on your device to the Spotify app so you can listen to them whenever you want. However, your personal files will only be available on all the devices sharing the same WIFI network.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: Choose a particular artist to build a station around.

features.name: Internet Radio
features.description: Looks like Spotify is experimenting with Internet Radio but this feature is quite limited at the moment.

features.name: Integration
features.description: Integrated with Amazon's Echo ecosystem allowing subscribers to play songs using Alexa voice commands. Also, Spotify integrates with Google Chromecast allowing for a quick and easy way to stream music from your home theater system.

features.name: Social
features.description: Allows subscribers to follow friends, see what they listen to and who they follow. Also gives users the ability to share or recommend playlists, along with giving users the ability to publish their listening history to Facebook.

features.name: Activities
features.description: On smartphones with the appropriate sensors, Spotify has the ability to provide a playlist tailored to the user’s running speed. Users can also choose from a variety of playlists, categorized by environment (cold weather, evening), genre, or even popularity.

list.name: Apple Music
list.description: Apple Music touts about 40M+ songs and it has the advantage of securing more exclusives than the competition, giving users access to the entire iTunes library (including your own, ripped from CD songs), curated playlists, and a 24-hour radio station helmed by BBC-alum Zane Lowe. It does a great job curating playlists (by a team of experts) to appeal to your preferences.

pricing.misc: Offline music, Unlimitted skips
Up to 6 accounts
Save 50% on an Individual subscription
Get 2 months Free

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: Over 40M+ songs are available for streaming. You also have the capability to integrate your personal iTunes library, whether it was purchased via the iTunes Store, ripped from a CD or uploaded to iTunes Match, it will appear in your Apple Music library alongside Apple's standard catalog. Beyond music, you can also experience music videos, concert films, live shows, and original content like TV shows and movies.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: You can create and share any playlist that you've created yourself, or that was created by another Apple Music user and added to your library.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: Curated Stations (by a team of experts) are available to appeal to your preferences. Stations might be based on style (mellow, jazzy hip hop), a particular artist, or even a particular activity like driving.

features.name: Local Files / Uploads
features.description: You can have up to 100,000 songs in your music library. Songs that you buy or bought from the iTunes Store or added to Library using your Apple Music membership don't count against this limit. Only songs smaller than 200 MB or shorter than 2 hours can be added to the iCloud Music Library.

features.name: Internet Radio
features.description: Beats 1 broadcasts 24/7 to more than 100 countries and regions. Hear exclusive interviews, guest hosts, and the best of what’s going on in music. Apple Music also features live stations such as Bloomberg Radio, ESPN News and Sports, and NPR News and Culture.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: There are a number of sections for new releases, "Music You Need to Hear", "Hot Tracks" and more. However, Apple Music is cutting back on album exclusives. It will still do "some" streaming exclusives while planning to move aggresively into exclusive videos.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: With an Apple Music subscription and iCloud Music Library enabled, you have the option to download any song, album, or playlist from its catalog for offline listening.

features.name: Integration
features.description: Siri is integrated with Apple Music, allowing subscribers to issue voice commands through their iPhone or Mac.

features.name: Social
features.description: In addition to the capability to share playlists, another social feature comes from the Connect function, which brings artists and fans closer together. You can comment, like or share any artist's message over Facebook and Twitter along with individual songs and albums.

features.name: Activities
features.description: Activities are available from the Curated Playlists, labeled Activities & Moods.

list.name: Pandora
list.description: With a combination of traditional radio stations, easy to navigate interface and advanced discovery mechanisms, Pandora is a beautiful and intuitive product. With an estimated 40M tracks, you'll get access to one the biggest catalog of songs on the internet, however, some subscribiers reported that there's a fare share of karaoke tracks and cover versions mixed in.

pricing.misc: Ad-supported, 6 skips/hour, 1 hour timeout
Unlimitted skips, replays, offline listening (3 stations)
1 Free Month
All Plus features, no timeouts, no download limits, on-demand, customizable playlists
1 Free Month

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: There are over 40M songs to choose from but there's also a lot of chaff (karaoke tracks and cover versions, etc) you'll have to sort through.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: With the Premium subscription you can easily fully customize your playlists and add specific songs, artists, and albums in the order you prefer. Auto-generated playlists are created after you have Thumbed-up five or more songs on stations you've created. My Thumbs Up is a playlist that collects your Thumbed up tracks from each of your stations. Every time you Thumb up a song on your stations, it will be automatically added to this playlist.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: Pandora at its core is a radio service. Start a radio station by adding an artist or song title and then providing hints along the way by giving songs a thumbs up or thumbs down. Pandora has one of the most advanced algorithms in choosing songs for you by picking the right tracks using info like instruments used for a song, distortion level, track tempo and more.

features.name: Local Files / Uploads
features.description: Although you can't add your library to Pandora, you can however add album art, biography and lyrics to your Station.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: You can download the most-listened-to stations and add them to your Offline Station list. Pandora queues up your top three stations (plus your Thumbprint Radio if you’ve added it), and your listening experience will effortlessly go into offline mode. You won't be able to do it on iPads or tables with cellular capability just yet.

features.name: Integration
features.description: Pandora integrates with a lot of devices and, if you've purchased your car rencently, it's probably in your car too. It integrates nicely with Amazon's Echo (just ask Alexa).

features.name: Social
features.description: There are some social sharing features with support for Facebook and Twitter but not on the redesigned website.

list.name: Tidal
list.description: TIDAL started as a Hi-Def / Lossless music experience, but in time the company adapted its service and it now includes a library of over 40M songs and 75K videos. Its library is at par with its competitors and it includes exclusive content, access to rough tracks, studio sessions and, a place to buy merchandise. Tidal’s library can sound significantly better than rival companies' streams.

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: TIDAL has over 48.5M songs in its catalog and over 175,000 high quality videos, offering premium and high fidelity sound quality, along with high resolution video, and expertly curated editorial content.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: Tidal seems to be the place-to-go for new releases and exclusive content. With a TIDAL subscription you get singles, albums and videos, access to tickets that others can’t get, and experiences that are developed exclusively for TIDAL members.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: Create a new Playlist, then choose a name. Search for the track of your choice and add the song to your playlist. You can also search Playlists by genre or pick one of the many curated available ones.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: Download content of your choosing to your device, and play it when there is no network available. This works for both Premium and HiFi.

features.name: Local Files / Uploads
features.description: Import your playlists to TIDAL using the 3rd party service Soundiiz.com

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: Select an artist radio or individual track radio, and let Tidal do the work for you.

features.name: Integration
features.description: Not surprisingly, Tidal is available to a lot of high-end streaming devices like Sonos, Polk, Denon, Harman Kardon and many more.

features.name: Social
features.description: Connect Tidal to Facebook which will allow you to share music with your friends. You can also extract a URL if you want to link someone to any album, playlist or track.

list.name: Amazon Music
list.description: Amazon has various plans for Prime and non-Prime members. The best option is Music Unlimited which is good for "tens of millions of songs" and dozens of stations in its catalog, plus the expected genres variety. The app interface is designed to help you discover music by recommending albums and playlists based on your listening habits.
list.trial: Free 30-day Trial for the Unlimited plan!

pricing.misc: Free with Amazon Prime membership 2M songs, ad-free, on-demand, unlimited skips, offline listening
40M songs, ad-free, on-demand, unlimited skips, offline listening
All features of Music Unlimited for Amazon Prime members
2-months free and All features of Music Unlimited Prime plan
All features of Music Unlimited on a single Echo, Dot or Tap
All features of Music Unlimited plan for up to 6 family members
2-months free and all features of Music Unlimited Family plan for Amazon Prime Members

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: The Prime plan includes only about 2 million songs. With an Amazon Music Unlimited subscription, you get access to tens of millions of songs, thousands of Playlists hand-curated by Amazon's music experts, and personalized Stations.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: There's a New Releases Album section which includes the hottest new releases from today's most popular artists. Exclusive are rare but they do happen (Garth Brooks in late 2016).

features.name: Playlists
features.description: The Playlists For You section offers collections for any mood or activity plus the expected Classical, Decades, Rock, and Hip-Hop genres.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: Download as many songs as you'd like from Prime Music, to any compatible mobile device registered to your Amazon account. You can have up to 10 different devices authorized to use Amazon Music on your account.

features.name: Local Files / Uploads
features.description: Upload up to 250 songs to My Music for free. Once uploaded, your music stays synchronized across all of your devices. Amazon Digital Music purchases do not count towards library limits, however, in order to upload your music, you need to install the Amazon Music for PC or Mac.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: Similar to the Playlists section, the Unlimited plan has thousands of expert-programmed stations.

features.name: Integration
features.description: Use an Echo, Echo Dot, or Amazon Tap to search for songs by lyrics, fire up playlists, and search for songs to match your mood.

features.name: Social
features.description: Share stations and playlists to Facebook or Twitter.

features.name: Activities
features.description: Choose a Playlists based on you mood (work, study, workout, etc) or favorite genre (rock, jazz, pop, etc).

list.name: Google Play Music
list.description: Google Play boosts a sizable music library of over 40M songs of really good sound quality (320kbps) as well as YouTube integration, and, lots of tunes in the form of playlists, artist-specific channels, and on-demand streams. It will also recommend music based on your interests by asking you to select a handful of genres in the setup step.
list.trial: Free 30-day Trial for the Unlimited plan!

pricing.misc: Ad-supported, 6 skips / hour, 50K songs upload
Unlimited skips, 50K songs upload, offline playback, free YouTube red
All features of Unlimited for up to 6 people

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: Google's Music Library of over 40M songs is broken into Playlists, Stations, Artist, Albums, Songs and Genres. Add to that the free access to YouTube Red and you end up with a sieable collection of songs and music videos.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: There's a New Releases section which presents you with the newest album releases.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: Add purchased, uploaded, or subscription tracks to playlists. You can add up to 1,000 songs to a playlist. Google uses smart recommendations to build its curated auto-playlists.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: Google allows downloads on up to 5 devices and up to 10 devices can be authorized for your account.

features.name: Local Files / Uploads
features.description: Google Play Music offers all users storage of up to 50,000 files from their music collection online at no cost, and the ability to listen to them through the service's web player and mobile apps. The service scans the user's collection and matches the files to tracks in Google's catalog, which can then be streamed or downloaded in 320 kpbs MP3 format.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: Under Listen Now Google offers I'm feeling lucky radio. The more you use Google Music the more accurate the I'm feeling lucky suggestions become. Download radio stations to your Android mobile device to listen without an Internet connection.

features.name: Integration
features.description: Play songs, albums, playlists, and more from Google Play Music on your Sonos speakers through your device or computer.

features.name: Social
features.description: Share music in your library with others (excluding uploaded songs due to copyright concerns).

features.name: Activities
features.description: Activitiy Playlists are included for working, working out, keeping calm and mellow...and more.

list.name: Microsoft Groove Music
list.description: Previously known as Xbox Music and Zune Music, Microsoft’s Groove Music packs 40M+ songs of an undisclosed sound quality (probably 192kbps or better) and, a friendly interface that lets you easily construct playlists and custom radio stations. Users can also upload their own tunes to the cloud (OneDrive) where they’ll always be available to your Groove Music App.

pricing.misc: Ad-free, unlimited skips, offline playback, 50K songs upload
All monthly features at a 10% discount

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: Make and find Playlists for any ocation from more than 40M songs - Romantic dinners, workout mixes, and highway getaways.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: There's a section for New Releases.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: Create a Playlist by dragging a song or album onto the new Playlist; dragging a track or album to Collection creates what is essentially a shortcut to your favorite content.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: Download songs to listen to later when you're not online.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: The Radio section encourages you to enter an artist's name to build a themed playlist.

list.name: Slacker Radio
list.description: Essentially a radio station to match your music interests, Slacker delivers free and subscription-based access to millions of songs and hundreds of expert-programmed stations (DNA stations, channels hosted by music experts who play the tracks that influenced important artists), plus news, sports, talk and entertaining lifestyles channels. It also boosts some deep customization options.

pricing.misc: 6 skips/hour/station, create custom stations
Ad-free, unlimited skips, cache stations for offline listening
All features of Radio Plus and, on-demand play, create playlists, cache albums/playlists for offline listening

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: Slacker Radio is mainly based on Stations / Playlists covering new album releases, artists and the usual collection of genres like Decades, Rock, Chill, Blues, etc.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: You can create and manage custom playlists or listen to any of the miriad of pre-loaded playlists Slack offers. Your playlists, custom stations, and recently played stations are all listed under the My Music category.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: Includes Slacker Top 40 and a Specials section for original countdowns, artist takeovers, and more.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: With a paid subscription you can add a station/album/playlist to Offline (Downloaded) Content for offline listening.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: Slacker's selection of radio stations is unique and well-curated. Listen to existing stations, add them to your favorites, build custom stations around songs, artists or genres, view other stations based on the currently playing song, fine tune your stations to favor playing more or less of your favorites, newly discovered music, popular songs, older/newer tracks, etc.

features.name: Internet Radio
features.description: Slacker includes news and weather updates, live ESPN radio, entertaining lifestyles channels, and well organized themed internet radio stations.

list.name: Napster
list.description: Formerly know as Rhapsody, Napster has a catalog of over 30 million songs. The Premier option offers on-demand, ad-free music, lets you create playlists, customize them with giphys and make them public so that others can tune in and check out your music taste. The "Music Match" feature finds members with similar music tastes, and recommends songs and playlists for you.
list.trial: Free 30-day Trial of the Premier Plan!

pricing.misc: 30M songs, ad-free, personalized radio unlimited skips - 14-day Free Trial
all features of unRadio plus 30-day Free Trial, create playlists, on-demand, offline and social listening
all features of Premier for up to 5 people

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: Over 30 million songs on demand, available to browse through in a variety of genres. Search for specific tracks, artists and albums and choose songs that are trending. Stream music that matches your current mood.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: The Trending section includes the top/hot tracks for a variety of genres as well as a specific New Releases playlist.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: Create playlists with the Playlist Maker. As you build your playlist, Napster shows you suggestions based on songs in your list and your listening habits. Customize your playlists with an animated GIF from GIPHY and share it with your friends (or the world).

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: Download any song to listen offline.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: Radio Stations are available to listen to and add to your favorites. You can search stations by category/genres or select existing specially currated stations.

features.name: Social
features.description: Share playlists with your friends. Other Napster members can follow your playlists so they automatically get updates you make. Music Match finds members with similar music tastes, and recommend songs and playlists for you.

features.name: Activities
features.description: The Activities playlist offers a number of pre-built playlists for working out, airplane rides, party mixes, etc

list.name: SoundCloud
list.description: Described as the world’s leading social sound platform where anyone can listen to or create sounds and share them everywhere, SoundCloud lets you be a creator, a listener or a curator which listens, saves, and follows up-and-coming creators, builds hit playlists and shares the passion with its followers.

pricing.misc: ad-supported, 120M+ tracks to stream and share
120M+ tracks, ad-free, offline listening, 3 hours of space for uploads
150M+ tracks, ad-free, offline listening, 6 hours of space for uploads

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: SoundCloud has a library of over 100 million songs, consisting of DJ mixes, covers and unique music from content creators. It's also fairly popular for podcasts. With a subscription you have access to even more songs (about 20M+ more) including content from major artists.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: SoundCloud is increasingly becoming a place where users can discover the latest recordings, the songs and artists that will be popular tomorrow.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: Playlists are sets or albums that you can create using your own or other people's tracks on SoundCloud. A nice touch is provided by the Charts section where you can listen to Top 50 or New & Hot tracks from a variety of genres including Jazz & Blues, Pop, Rock, Ambient, Classical and many more.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: Offline listening is available through the SoundCloud Go subscription. With offline listening, it can be as simple as liking your favorite tracks or playlists and they’re instantly on your mobile device, with or without signal.

features.name: Local Files / Uploads
features.description: It doesn't matter if you're a Free, Pro or Pro Unlimited user - anyone can upload their tracks to SoundCloud for the world to hear. By uploading, you confirm that your tracks comply with SoundCloud's Terms of Use and don’t infringe on anyone else’s rights. Uploads are Web only.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: Stations is a way to discover the tracks you've never heard anywhere else, making it easy to tap into a long stream of music related to your favorite tracks. With Stations, you’ll get an endless stream of audio pulled from the 135 million tracks available on SoundCloud.

features.name: Social
features.description: Users can follow each other, which allows you to find music based on another user’s musical taste and preferences. SoundCloud offers plenty of opportunities to share and embed its players to various social networks includng Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Pinterest, etc.

list.name: Deezer
list.description: Choose from over 43 million tracks. Discover the perfect playlist or create your own from millions of playlists, albums, mixes, and more. Browse curated collections by genre. Play everything from the Top 40 to unsigned acts on all your devices, see the lyrics to all your favorites on-screen.

pricing.misc: Flow & mixes only
No ads, offline listening, 45MB upload limit
All features of Premium+ for up to 6 music profiles

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: Once singed up, you select 5 genres and Deezer makes up a Flow personalized radio station of endless streaming. The original selection gets better with each song provided you let Deezer know if you liked the song or not. If liked, the song goes automatically into your Favorites list. Deezer also hosts podcasts (freely uploadable) and, various internet radio stations.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: Listen to the current Charts or Popular list or, pick a playlist from the New Releases section.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: Lots of Playlists are available to choose from including Popular, Charts, and Picks selected by Deezer's editors. Or, just create your own and populate it with your favorites.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: Deezer allows downloads keep your favorite tunes with you, wherever you go! In order to continue having access to your offline music you do need to connect to your Deezer account every 15 days and confirm your subscription.

features.name: Local Files / Uploads
features.description: Deezer's MP3 upload option lets you load your own music files into your Deezer account. You can add as many MP3s as you like, just make sure each is less than 45Mb

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: The Radio Stations selection includes Artist Radio for the artists you like and lots of genre stations to choose from.

features.name: Internet Radio
features.description: There are quite a few Internet Radio stations, local and international, to choose from ordered by popularity.

features.name: Integration
features.description: There are loads of devices that work with Deezer and with a Premium+ subscription you can connect up to 3 different devices, in your car, through Chromecast, SONOS or Apple Watch.

features.name: Social
features.description: Social integration with Facebook is present, allowing you to see what your friends are listening to. The Feed section allows you to connect your Deezer account to Facebook, Twitter or Google+.

list.name: iHeartRadio
list.description: iHeartRadio brings you thousands of real radio stations covering Pop, Country, Hip-Hop, R&B, Alternative, Rock, Talk, News, Sports, Comedy and Exclusive iHeartRadio live music events. Choose your favorite song or artist and iHeartRadio does all the work to create your station from a library of 20 million songs and 800,000 artists. Fine-tune your stations using thumbs up or down.

pricing.misc: Listen to your favorite Live Stations, create ad-free all-music Artist Radio Stations
On-demand music, unlimited skips, save songs from radio to your playlist, replay radio songs. Signing up through the iOS AppStore costs $5.99/mo
All Radio Plus features plus offline listening, create unlimited playlists

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: iHeartRadio has dozens of curated artist stations, lots of genre stations, and more than 400,000 artists and 15 million songs in the iHeartRadio catalog.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: There's a New Releases section titled Fresh Pick Mondays with a variety of video-blogs from New Music Reports, New Releases, Expert Picks, Emerging Artists and more.

features.name: Playlists
features.description: Create unlimited playlists with iHeartRadio All Access plan or just listen to any of the existing one organized by Featured, Decades, Moods & Activities, Genres and more.

features.name: Offline Listening / Downloads
features.description: With iHeartRadio All Access you can take your playlists from online to offline with a quick toggle. The Offline feature is only available in the iOS and Android versions of the iHeartRadio app.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: You have to option to create your own Artist Radion Stations or listen to any of the exising ones featuring Popular Artists or Genres.

features.name: Internet Radio
features.description: iHeartRadio is firmly focused on live internet radio streams. Its homepage prominently displays a 20-square grid that highlights Top 40& Pop, Rock, Jazz, Comedy, News & Talk, Sports, and other categories of content. The Live Radio section also lists the top stations in your location.

features.name: Integration
features.description: There are multiple devices you can listen to iHeartRadio from, including Home Entertainment devices and Automotive.

features.name: Social
features.description: Facebook Timeline is a way to aggregate and publish the top radio stations, artist, and song you listen enjoy on your Facebook Profile.

features.name: Activities
features.description: Playlists categorised in Moods & Activities can be used for workouts, parties, road trips, focus, sleep, chill and more.

list.name: Last.fm
list.description: Last.fm helps you explore a vast world of music and learn about new music you might like, see what other people like and share your passion for music with them, track what you’ve heard and use this to power for recommendations and re-discovery. A cool feature is the ability to generate detailed charts and stats based on users' personal tastes every week.

pricing.misc: Stream music for free while combining your favorite music with great listening, watching and sharing features too
Ad-free, Exclusive early access

features.name: Library / Catalog
features.description: Last.fm's music library contains well over 12 million individual audio tracks and videos from artists on all the major commercial and independent labels. Commercially available albums are regularly added by Last.fm staff. The library includes a wide variety of genres including videos, photos, stats, charts, biographies, concerts and popular music, classical, opera and musicals, as well as many little known and specialist recordings which are no longer generally available.

features.name: New Releases / Exclusives
features.description: Listen to new musing by accessing the Live Charts, New Releases and Coming Soon sections.

features.name: Radio Stations
features.description: You can start a Last.fm station, which plays a mix of different artists, from a user profile page, an artist page or a tag page. Last.fm also offers customised virtual radio stations consisting of uninterrupted audio streams of individual tracks selected from the music files in the music library.

features.name: Integration
features.description: Last.fm can be integrated with other popular music services, including your iTunes library, Spotify, YouTube, SoundCloud and others in a way that brings them together to make them more powerful than they are when used alone.

features.name: Social
features.description: When you sign up, you can build your own Last.fm user profile and then you can go ahead and connect with friends or check out your weekly musical neighbors. Follow everyone you are friends with and they are following you. Groups and events are available to join as well.
